function NPC_702002:Init( NPCID ) --[[ 1: 2: 공포의장막 누적데미지 --]] NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 2 )
NPC_702002.LimitForBreakShield = (NPC_702002.MaxHP/20)/20
NPC_702002.BufIdShieldOfDarkness = 40323
NPC_702002.NpcIdPSphere = 7512005 NPC_702002.NpcIdMSphere = 7512006
NPC_702002.TalIdModeChange1 = 251200220 NPC_702002.TalIdModeChange2 = 251200221 NPC_702002.TalIdModeChange3 = 251200222 NPC_702002.TalIdDeclareDarkness = 251200214
NPC_702002.TTLElectricOrb = 20 end
function NPC_702002:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, 2 do this:SetUserData( i, 0 ) end end
function NPC_702002:OnActSummonPlusSphere( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_702002:OnFinishSummonPlusSphere\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor)
local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( ThisNPC:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), vec3( -300, 0, 0 ) ) local Minion = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_702002.NpcIdPSphere, WorldPos )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_702002:OnActSummonMinusSphere( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_702002:OnFinishSummonMinusSphere\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor)
local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( ThisNPC:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), vec3( 300, 0, 0 ) ) local Minion = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_702002.NpcIdMSphere, WorldPos )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_702002:OnActSummonSpheres( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_702002:OnActSummonSpheres\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor)
local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( ThisNPC:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), vec3( -300, 0, 0 ) ) local PSphere = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_702002.NpcIdPSphere, WorldPos )
local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( ThisNPC:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), vec3( 300, 0, 0 ) ) local MSphere = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_702002.NpcIdMSphere, WorldPos )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_702002:DeclareDarkness( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_702002:DeclareDarkness\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor)
local NewEnemy = ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_702002.TalIdDeclareDarkness ) then return end
ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_702002.TalIdDeclareDarkness, NewEnemy ) end
function NPC_702002:OnStartShieldOfDarkness( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC(ThisActor)
ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_702002.BufIdShieldOfDarkness ) end
function NPC_702002:OnFinishShieldOfDarkness( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor) -- 공포의 장막 누적데미지 리셋 ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0 ) end
function NPC_702002:OnFinishAndAggroShort( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor)
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_702002:AccDamage( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) -- 공포의 보호막 버프 처리
if ThisNPC:CheckBuff( NPC_702002.BufIdShieldOfDarkness ) then local ShieldDmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) + HitInfo.Damage
if ShieldDmgAcc > NPC_702002.LimitForBreakShield then -- 보호막 깨짐 처리 ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_702002.BufIdShieldOfDarkness ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0 ) HitInfo.Damage = ShieldDmgAcc - NPC_702002.LimitForBreakShield else -- 보호막 데미지 누적및 실데미지 무효화 ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, ShieldDmgAcc ) end
return HitInfo end
--- mode change local HPPer = ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP() if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 and HPPer < 0.9 then ThisNPC:ClearJob() --GLog( "ModeChange1 " .. NPC_702002.TalIdModeChange1 .. "\n") ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_702002.TalIdModeChange1 ) elseif ThisNPC:GetMode() == 1 and HPPer < 0.5 then --GLog( "ModeChange2 \n") ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart( 1, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_702002.TalIdModeChange2 ) elseif ThisNPC:GetMode() == 2 and HPPer < 0.2 then --GLog( "ModeChange3 \n") ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_702002.TalIdModeChange3 ) end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_702002:OnHitCapsule_1_0( HitInfo ) return NPC_702002:AccDamage( this, HitInfo ) end
